title: Rider transfer ticker: Steels joins Movistar, Mulubrhan steps into WorldTour with Astana, EF-Cannondale adds two more
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: Steels joins Movistar, Mulubrhan steps into WorldTour with Astana, EF-Cannondale adds two more on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
